name: React JS
description: Learn the fundamentals of React.js to build dynamic, responsive web applications using components, hooks, and state management. Gain hands-on experience creating interactive single-page apps.

name: Java
description: Learn core Java programming concepts, including object-oriented design, data structures, and exception handling, to build efficient and reliable applications.

name: Python
description: Learn Python programming from the ground up, covering syntax, data structures, functions, and file handling. Build practical applications and develop problem-solving skills.

name: Java Script
description: Learn the core concepts of JavaScript for interactive web development. Explore variables, functions, events, DOM manipulation, and modern ES6+ features to create dynamic websites.

name: HTML and CSS
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development using HTML and CSS. Build and style responsive web pages with layouts, typography, and modern design techniques.

name: Mongo DB
description: Learn to design and manage NoSQL databases using MongoDB. Explore document modeling, CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and data integration for modern web applications.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Learn the principles of database design, modeling, and implementation. Topics include SQL, normalization, transactions, indexing, and database security for efficient data management.
author: 654f9ec2ea7ead465908d1e3

name: Node JS
description: Learn to build fast, scalable server-side applications using Node.js. Explore asynchronous programming, APIs, and integration with databases to develop efficient backend systems.
author: 654f9ec2ea7ead465908d1e3
